name: Among The Shadows (Nevayashka)
description:
Made for One Script Jam 2022

In this game, you have to protect your companion from a bunch of monsters. The companion, in turn, can heal you and improve your abilities.

Monsters are dangerous, death does not stop them, but only makes them angrier.

Unfinished but playable. 

Please read the readme.txt to understand how to play!
